nodes.name: SQL
nodes.description: This node runs the given SQL on the incoming DataFrame
nodes.hint: Whenever the table is changed, go to InferSchema tab and Infer the Schema

fields.name: storageLevel
fields.title: Output Storage Level
fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.name: tempTable
fields.title: Temp Table
fields.description: Temp Table Name to be used

fields.name: sql
fields.value:
WITH distances AS (
    SELECT 
        l1.Cell_Id AS Cell_Id,
        l1.Name AS Name,
        l2.Cell_Id AS Nearest_Cell_Id,
        (2 * 6371 * ASIN(SQRT(
            POWER(SIN(RADIANS(l2.Latitude - l1.Latitude) / 2), 2) + 
            COS(RADIANS(l1.Latitude)) * COS(RADIANS(l2.Latitude)) * 
            POWER(SIN(RADIANS(l2.Longitude - l1.Longitude) / 2), 2)
        ))) AS Distance
    FROM 
        fire_temp_table l1
    JOIN 
        fire_temp_table l2 
    ON 
        l1.Cell_Id <> l2.Cell_Id
)
, ranked_distances AS (
    SELECT 
        Cell_Id, 
        Name, 
        Nearest_Cell_Id, 
        Distance,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY Cell_Id ORDER BY Distance ASC) AS rn
    FROM 
        distances
)
SELECT 
    d1.Cell_Id, 
    d1.Name,
    d1.Nearest_Cell_Id AS `1st Nearest Cell ID`, 
    d1.Distance AS `1st Nearest Distance`,
    d2.Nearest_Cell_Id AS `2nd Nearest Cell ID`, 
    d2.Distance AS `2nd Nearest Distance`,
    d3.Nearest_Cell_Id AS `3rd Nearest Cell ID`, 
    d3.Distance AS `3rd Nearest Distance`
FROM 
    ranked_distances d1
LEFT JOIN 
    ranked_distances d2 
ON 
    d1.Cell_Id = d2.Cell_Id AND d2.rn = 2
LEFT JOIN 
    ranked_distances d3 
ON 
    d1.Cell_Id = d3.Cell_Id AND d3.rn = 3
WHERE 
    d1.rn = 1
ORDER BY 
    d1.Cell_Id;
fields.title: SQL
fields.description: SQL to be run

fields.name: outputColNames
fields.value: ["Cell_Id","Name","1st Nearest Cell ID","1st Nearest Distance","2nd Nearest Cell ID","2nd Nearest Distance","3rd Nearest Cell ID","3rd Nearest Distance"]

nodes.name: SQL
nodes.description: This node runs the given SQL on the incoming DataFrame
nodes.hint: Whenever the table is changed, go to InferSchema tab and Infer the Schema

fields.name: storageLevel
fields.title: Output Storage Level
fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.name: tempTable
fields.title: Temp Table
fields.description: Temp Table Name to be used

fields.name: sql
fields.value:
SELECT t1.`CDR_ID`, t1.`Call_Start_Time`, t1.`Call_End_Time`, t1.`Duration_Seconds`, t1.`Caller_Number`, t1.`Callee_Number`, t1.`Caller_Location_Cell_ID`, t1.`Callee_Location_Cell_ID`, t1.`Call_Direction`, t1.`Call_Status`, 
IF(t1.`Call_Direction` = "Incoming", t1.`Callee_Location_Cell_ID`, IF(t1.`Call_Direction` = "Outgoing", t1.`Caller_Location_Cell_ID`, NULL)) AS Required_Cell_id, 
IF(t2.`Call_Direction` = "Incoming", t2.`Callee_Location_Cell_ID`, IF(t2.`Call_Direction` = "Outgoing", t2.`Caller_Location_Cell_ID`, NULL)) AS Adjecent_Cell_id, t2.CDR_ID as Adjecent_CDR_ID,
((unix_timestamp(t2.`Frmt_Call_Start_Time`)-unix_timestamp(t1.`Frmt_Call_End_Time`))) AS SecondsDifference
FROM `fire_temp_table_2` t1
JOIN `fire_temp_table_2` t2 ON t1.CDR_ID < t2.CDR_ID AND ((t1.Caller_Number = t2.Caller_Number AND t1.Callee_Number = t2.Callee_Number) OR (t1.Caller_Number = t2.Callee_Number AND t1.Callee_Number = t2.Caller_Number))
WHERE ((unix_timestamp(t2.`Frmt_Call_Start_Time`)-unix_timestamp(t1.`Frmt_Call_End_Time`))) <= 30
fields.title: SQL
fields.description: SQL to be run

nodes.name: Join Using SQL
nodes.description: This node registers the incoming DataFrames as temporary tables and executes the SQL provided

fields.name: storageLevel
fields.title: Output Storage Level
fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.name: tempTables
fields.title: Temp Table Names
fields.description: Temp Table Name to be used

fields.name: sql
fields.value:
WITH ranked_cdr AS (
  SELECT t1.Cell_id, t1.Name, t2.Required_Cell_id, t2.Adjecent_Cell_id, 
    IF(t2.Required_Cell_id IS NULL, 0, COUNT(*)) AS CDR_Count,
      ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY t1.Cell_Id ORDER BY IF(t2.Required_Cell_id IS NULL, 0, COUNT(*)) DESC) AS rn
    FROM tempTable1 t1 LEFT JOIN tempTable2 t2 ON t1.Cell_id = Cast(t2.Required_Cell_id As Int)
    
    GROUP BY t1.Cell_id, t1.Name, t2.Required_Cell_id, t2.Adjecent_Cell_id
    ORDER BY t1.Cell_id
)

SELECT 
    d1.Cell_Id, 
    d1.Name,
    d1.Adjecent_Cell_id AS `1st Nearest Cell ID`, 
    d1.CDR_Count AS `1st Max_Count`,
    d2.Adjecent_Cell_id AS `2nd Nearest Cell ID`, 
    d2.CDR_Count AS `2nd Max_Count`,
    d3.Adjecent_Cell_id AS `3rd Nearest Cell ID`, 
    d3.CDR_Count AS `3rd Max_Count`
FROM 
    ranked_cdr d1
LEFT JOIN 
    ranked_cdr d2 
ON 
    d1.Cell_Id = d2.Cell_Id AND d2.rn = 2
LEFT JOIN 
    ranked_cdr d3 
ON 
    d1.Cell_Id = d3.Cell_Id AND d3.rn = 3
WHERE 
    d1.rn = 1
ORDER BY 
    d1.Cell_Id;
fields.title: SQL
fields.description: SQL to be run

fields.name: outputColNames
fields.value: ["Cell_Id","Name","1st Nearest Cell ID","1st Max_Count","2nd Nearest Cell ID","2nd Max_Count","3rd Nearest Cell ID","3rd Max_Count"]
